Job Requirements The strengths and skills that will help you succeed • Enrolled in a Master's degree program in a top Canadian University in a quantitative field (e.g., Computer Science, Engineering, Operations Research, Statistics, or Mathematics). • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills. • Very good communication skills in English* (written and oral). • Hands-on experience contributing to data science, machine learning, deep learning, or GenAI projects in Python. Could be during past internships/work experience, for class projects, contributing to an open-source project, or for personal projects. • Demonstrable portfolio of data science / machine learning projects. • Hands-on experience with machine learning frameworks (e.g., scikit-learn, PyTorch) and/or GenAI/Agentic frameworks (e.g., transformers, langchain/langgraph, llamaindex, OpenAI Agents SDK, crewAI). • Command of at least one data analysis and processing library (e.g., pandas, SQL, Spark, Dask). • Experience with visualization libraries (matplotlib, seaborn, plotly). Strong work ethics and ability to deal with confidential information. • *Given the vast majority of our clients, both internal and external, are based outside of Quebec and Canada, specific language requirements may apply.
